title: Crafting Polynomials
content: Some interesting problems#\[\text{For} \; n \geq 2 \; \text{the polynomial} \; P_n(x) = x^n + a_{n-1}x^{n-1}+ ... + a_{1}x + a_0 \; \text{has the property that} \; P_n(k) = 5k^{n-1} \text{for k = 1, 2, ... n.} \newline \text{Find an expression for } a_{n-1} \; \text{in terms of n.}\]Idea: Craft polynomial [g(x)] with roots 1, 2, 3, … n.
